member.name: T:MassTransit.StructureMapIntegration.MassTransitRegistryBase
member.summary: This is an extension of the StrutureMap registry exposing methods to make it easy to get Mass Transit set up.

member.name: M:MassTransit.StructureMapIntegration.MassTransitRegistryBase.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor with not actual registration

member.name: M:MassTransit.StructureMapIntegration.MassTransitRegistryBase.#ctor(System.Type[])
member.summary: Creates a registry for a service bus listening to an endpoint

member.name: M:MassTransit.StructureMapIntegration.MassTransitRegistryBase.RegisterInMemorySubscriptionService
member.summary: Registers the in-memory subscription service so that all buses created in the same process share subscriptions

member.name: M:MassTransit.StructureMapIntegration.MassTransitRegistryBase.RegisterBusDependencies
member.summary: Registers the types used by the service bus internally and as part of the container. These are typically items that are not swapped based on the container implementation
